events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on the highway last night with significant rear-end damage.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords identified in the initial report regarding vehicle collision.
A claims agent specialized in auto insurance cases has been assigned to manage the customer's claim promptly and efficiently.
Acknowledgement of the claim has been sent to the customer, confirming receipt and outlining the next steps for processing.
The customer was requested to provide photos of the damaged vehicle and the police report to support the auto accident claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and a copy of the police accident report for evaluation.
The investigation team has started reviewing the submitted documents and statements regarding the collision circumstances.
Investigation completed confirming liability and assessing the extent of damages to the insured vehicle after the accident.
A settlement offer was proposed based on evaluation of repair costs and policy coverage for the auto accident claim.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the timely and clear communication.
Claim has been officially approved following the customer's acceptance of the settlement terms for the vehicle damage.
Payment has been disbursed to the customerâ€™s account for vehicle repair costs as part of the approved settlement.
The auto accident claim has been formally closed after successful payment and resolution of all related issues.
All claim documentation and correspondence have been archived in the system for future reference and record keeping.
